description: Lists the rule executions that have occurred in a pipeline configured for conditions with rules.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline for which you want to get execution summary information.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Input information used to filter rule execution history. pipelineExecutionId (string) --- The pipeline execution ID used to filter rule execution history. latestInPipelineExecution (dict) --- The field that specifies to filter on the latest execution in the pipeline. The execution ID for the latest execution in the pipeline. The start time to filter on for the latest execution in the pipeline. Valid options: All Latest.

nested_params.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_params.description: The pipeline execution ID used to filter rule execution history.

nested_params.name: latestInPipelineExecution
nested_params.description: The field that specifies to filter on the latest execution in the pipeline.

nested_params.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_params.description: The execution ID for the latest execution in the pipeline.

nested_params.name: startTimeRange
nested_params.description: The start time to filter on for the latest execution in the pipeline. Valid options:

nested_items.name: ruleExecutionDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the output for listing rule executions.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the pipeline execution in the stage where the rule was run. Use the  GetPipelineState action to retrieve the current pipelineExecutionId of the stage.

nested_items.name: ruleExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the run for the rule.

nested_items.name: pipelineVersion
nested_items.description: The version number of the pipeline with the stage where the rule was run.

nested_items.name: stageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage where the rule was run.

nested_items.name: ruleName
nested_items.description: The name of the rule that was run in the stage.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the rule execution.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the last change to the rule execution, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who changed the rule execution details.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the rule execution. Status categories are InProgress, Succeeded, and Failed.

nested_items.name: ruleTypeId
nested_items.description: The ID for the rule type, which is made up of the combined values for category, owner, provider, and version. For more information about conditions, see Stage conditions. For more information about rules, see the CodePipeline rule reference.

nested_items.name: category
nested_items.description: A category defines what kind of rule can be run in the stage, and constrains the provider type for the rule. The valid category is Rule.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The creator of the rule being called. The valid value for the Owner field in the rule category is AWS.

nested_items.name: provider
nested_items.description: The rule provider, such as the DeploymentWindow rule. For a list of rule provider names, see the rules listed in the CodePipeline rule reference.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: A string that describes the rule version.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Configuration data for a rule execution, such as the resolved values for that run.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resolvedConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration data for a rule execution with all variable references replaced with their real values for the execution.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM service role that performs the declared rule. This is assumed through the roleArn for the pipeline.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for the rule, such as us-east-1.

nested_items.name: inputArtifacts
nested_items.description: Details of input artifacts of the rule that correspond to the rule execution.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The artifact object name for the action execution.

nested_items.name: s3location
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact location for the action execution.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 artifact bucket for an action's artifacts.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The artifact name.

nested_items.name: executionResult
nested_items.description: Execution result information listed in the output details for a rule execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionId
nested_items.description: The external ID for the rule execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionSummary
nested_items.description: The external provider summary for the rule execution.

nested_items.name: externalExecutionUrl
nested_items.description: The deepest external link to the external resource (for example, a repository URL or deployment endpoint) that is used when running the rule.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: Represents information about an error in CodePipeline.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The system ID or number code of the error.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used in the next ListRuleExecutions call. To view all items in the list, continue to call this operation with each subsequent token until no more nextToken values are returned.
